name: Dance-Off Stage
desc:
The Dance-Off Stage's control panel can be used to control the entire stage!
You can spin the turntables, switch camera angles, and even control the Dance-Off Stage's mechanisms and alter its effects. Go on, give it a spin!

imgDesc.text:
The Dance-Off Stage's control panel can be used to control the entire stage!
You can spin the turntables, switch camera angles, and even control the Dance-Off Stage's mechanisms and alter its effects. Go on, give it a spin!
You can control the stage during certain performances. Activate the mechanisms on the stage at the right times to match the performers' dancing and complete the performance!
